news.heading: COMPANY NEWS

1.title: Launch of the New Generation 80GHz Radar Sensor
1.summary: Introducing the 80GHz radar level sensor with high accuracy, suitable for modern SCADA systems.
1.content:
On July 15, 2025, Nhan Phu Industrial Equipment Co., Ltd officially launched its latest 80GHz radar sensor product line – a breakthrough solution in liquid and solid level measurement.

This sensor line uses high-frequency continuous wave radar (FMCW) technology for ±1mm precision measurement, unaffected by dust, steam, or foam – common interference factors in traditional industrial environments.

Notable features include:

  • Bluetooth, HART, and Modbus communication.
  • Compatibility with popular SCADA and DCS systems.
  • Easy installation and automatic calibration.

We believe this will be the top choice for industries such as water, food, oil & gas, chemicals, and other sectors requiring precise level monitoring in harsh conditions.

Details:

- Product code: NP-R80
- Warranty: 24 months
- Delivery: Within 5 business days

2.title: Remote Monitoring System Installed in Binh Chanh
2.summary: SCADA combined with sensors enables water quality monitoring, early warnings, and improved efficiency.
2.content:
In June 2025, Nhan Phu completed the deployment of a remote monitoring system for the Binh Chanh Water Treatment Plant.

The solution includes:

  • A central SCADA system for 24/7 water quality monitoring.
  • Integrated sensors for level, flow, pH, and turbidity.
  • Automatic data logging, real-time leak detection and quality deviation alerts.

This application helps reduce labor costs, improve reliability, and ensure safe water supply for thousands of households in western Ho Chi Minh City.

The plant representative stated: “Nhan Phu’s SCADA solution represents a significant advancement in modern clean water management and operations.”

3.title: 24/7 Technical Support Center Launched in Ho Chi Minh City
3.summary: Around-the-clock support for SCADA and IoT maintenance at Nhan Phu’s new center.
3.content:
On July 15, 2025, Nhan Phu officially opened its 24/7 Technical Support Center at its headquarters in Ho Chi Minh City. This is Vietnam's first center offering continuous support in measurement, SCADA, and industrial automation.

The center receives support requests nationwide via hotline, email, and online platforms. With experienced engineers, the center can handle issues remotely, coordinate maintenance, or provide system upgrade consultations in the shortest time.

Mr. Le Minh Tuan – Head of Technical Department, shared: “Many plants operate 24/7, so SCADA systems and sensors must remain stable. We ensure immediate technical support to help businesses maintain uninterrupted operations.”

This center is part of Nhan Phu’s strategy to enhance after-sales service and build long-term customer trust.

4.title: Successful Deployment of Leak Warning System in Central Vietnam
4.summary: Early warning solution helps protect the water supply system in Central Vietnam.
4.content:
In July 2025, Nhan Phu successfully implemented an automatic water leak warning system along a key pipeline supplying water in Central Vietnam. The project covered over 15km of piping, an area frequently affected by leaks and water loss causing significant operational damage.

The system uses modern sensors, including flow, pressure, and vibration sensors, connected directly to a SCADA platform for real-time data acquisition and processing. When abnormal pressure or flow is detected, the system automatically sends instant alerts to the control center and technicians via email or SMS.

A local water authority representative said: “The early warning system not only helps us proactively handle incidents but also protects water resources and prolongs pipeline life.”

Nhan Phu’s solution is highly rated for accuracy, scalability, and operational efficiency – a major step forward in the digital transformation of Vietnam’s water sector.

5.title: Ultrasonic Level Measurement Workshop Held in Hanoi
5.summary: In-depth training on ultrasonic sensors for engineers in Northern Vietnam.
5.content:
On June 22, 2025, Nhan Phu organized a workshop on 'Application of Ultrasonic Sensors in Industrial Level Measurement' in Hanoi.

The workshop covered:

  • Principles and configuration of ultrasonic level measurement devices.
  • Installation tips and interference handling experience.
  • Hands-on configuration with real devices on-site.

Location: Melia Hotel, Hanoi. Register by June 18, 2025, to receive training materials and discounts.

6.title: Introduction of Clamp-on Flow Measurement Devices
6.summary: Clamp-on flow meters allow measurement without pipe cutting.
6.content:
The new Clamp-on flowmeter line enables flow measurement without pipe intrusion, ideal for clean water, wastewater, and food industry applications.

Key benefits:

  • Quick installation within 15 minutes.
  • No disruption to production processes.
  • ±1.5% accuracy for pipes from DN25 to DN1000.

Products are now available at all Nhan Phu branches nationwide.

7.title: Automation Engineer Recruitment – July 2025
7.summary: Expanding technical team in HCMC, Hanoi, Da Nang – SCADA experience preferred.
7.content:
To meet market expansion needs, Nhan Phu is recruiting for the following positions:

  • Automation Engineer
  • SCADA Application Engineer
  • Field Technical Support Staff

Requirements:

  • University degree in Automation, Mechatronics, or Electrical Engineering.
  • Experience with Siemens PLCs and WinCC SCADA is a plus.
  • Proactive, adaptable, and willing to travel.

Apply via email: hr@nhanphu.com before July 25, 2025.

8.title: Warning on Counterfeit Ultrasonic Sensors in the Market
8.summary: Counterfeit devices posing as Nhan Phu products – check carefully.
8.content:
Recently, counterfeit ultrasonic sensors imitating Nhan Phu branding have appeared on the market, seriously affecting customer safety and brand reputation.

Counterfeit detection signs include:

  • Faded labels, incorrect product codes.
  • Lack of official warranty card.
  • Missing QR code for verification.

To protect your rights, only purchase from authorized distributors or verify via hotline 1900-2025.

9.title: Nhan Phu Implements Smart Monitoring System in Dong Nai
9.summary: SCADA – IoT used to monitor water at Amata pump station, Dong Nai.
9.content:
In July 2025, Nhan Phu officially commissioned a smart monitoring system for the pump station in Amata Industrial Park, Dong Nai.

The system combines level and flow sensors with SCADA and IoT technology to provide real-time data monitoring, enabling operators to detect issues early and optimize water distribution.

This is a flagship project demonstrating digital transformation in the water industry.

scada.slider_description: Monitor and control systems remotely in real time. Improve operational efficiency and reduce production risks.
scada.main_heading: SCADA Solution – Optimize Remote Monitoring and Control
scada.section1_desc: SCADA is a combination of software and hardware that allows users to monitor industrial processes, collect and process real-time data, and control devices remotely. It's a key component in industrial digital transformation.
scada.structure_item3: Sensors: Measure temperature, pressure, water level, etc.
scada.structure_item4: Communication networks: Modbus, DNP3, OPC, TCP/IP, etc.
scada.structure_item5: Server & HMI: Display, control, and store data.
section5_list: 📉 Reduce human error, optimize operational cost.
🔐 Data security and user access control.
🌐 Remote monitoring via browser or mobile device.
scada.section6_desc: Modern SCADA solutions are designed with open architecture, supporting integration with IoT, AI, and cloud computing.
section6_list: Access data anytime, anywhere via Web or App.
Control and optimize processes with AI.
